title: NodePort Service Practice
description: Deploy backend and frontend pods, expose the backend via a NodePort Service, and test internal and external access within the Killercoda cluster.

steps.title: Create Backend Deployment
steps.text: Apply backend-deploy.yaml to deploy nginx pods.

steps.title: Expose Backend via NodePort
steps.text: Apply backend-svc.yaml and verify the exposed node port.

steps.title: Create Frontend Curl Pod
steps.text: Deploy a curl pod using frontend-deploy.yaml to test backend connectivity.

steps.title: Access via NodePort
steps.text: Use node IP and port 30080 to test from control plane.
